raw akas.title: Beijing: Biography of an Imperial Capital

akas: Beijing: Biography of an Imperial Capital (original title)
akas from release info: Beijing: Biography of an Imperial Capital (original title)

1.title: Part 1: Center of the Cosmos

episode of.title: Beijing: Biography of an Imperial Capital (TV Series 2008)

1.plot: Beijing was an unlikely capital. Designed to replicate the Chinese vision of the cosmos, Imperial Beijing was laid out according to the principles of feng shui - the perfect balance between yin and yang, it was believed, would ensure peace and prosperity in the empire.

2.title: Part 2: Barbarians at the Gate

episode of.title: Beijing: Biography of an Imperial Capital (TV Series 2008)

2.plot: Beijing is where China and the outside world met, mediated and collided. For centuries, it straddled the boundary between Chinese civilization and the nomadic tribes of Central Asia. In Beijing, Jesuit missionaries first introduced Western science to the Chinese emperors.

3.title: Part 3: Emperors, Conquerors and Rebels

episode of.title: Beijing: Biography of an Imperial Capital (TV Series 2008)

3.plot: China's capital has been the stage for some of the giants of Chinese and world history. From the conquering Mongol hordes of Genghis Khan to China's exiled last emperor, Beijing's annals are filled with stories of victory and defeat, and the exploits of its rulers, rebels and renegades.

imdb.title: Beijing: Biography of an Imperial Capital
plot: Situated at the periphery of ancient China, Beijing could have been an insignificant border town but for the ideas of a few visionary men.
